properties.description: This pipeline use to copy DB to Blob.
Use to copy the tables from one DB to other DB.
This option used to move data from blob to db.

activities.name: copydatatodb
activities.description: This pipeline to load data from Blob to DB. We saving to github.

activities.name: SPToGetMetadata
activities.description: This proc used to get the data from metadata.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> moviesdbds20201010
moviesdbds20201010 filter(toInteger(year) >= 1910 && toInteger(year) <= 2000 && rlike(genres, 'Comedy')) ~> Filtercomedymovies
Filtercomedymovies aggregate(groupBy(year),
	avgcomedyrating = avg(toInteger(Rating))) ~> aggcomedymovie
aggcomedymovie sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['avgcomedymovierating'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> writeoutputtotheblobstorage

source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as string,
		ListPrice as string,
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string,
		SellStartDate as string,
		SellEndDate as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> salescsvmergeds
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ParentProductCategoryID as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> salescatdata
salescsvmergeds, salescatdata join(salescsvmergeds@ProductCategoryID == salescatdata@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> multiplefilesjoining
multiplefilesjoining sink(input(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as string,
		ListPrice as string,
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string,
		SellStartDate as string,
		SellEndDate as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['mergeddata'],
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name = salescsvmergeds@Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductCategoryID = salescatdata@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> joindatatofile
